ComicInfo.Summary:
Aladdin, the government agency created to keep track of ultras, has bugs set up in the home of Hardcase. Aladdin surveillance agents learn of the Alternate but have no idea who or what it is. Hardcase gets back to living his life by going to ceremony awards and giving interviews on television. Choice and Hardcase begin a romantic relationship and Choice confides in him that she is starting to remember some of her memories, but the memories reveal two distinctly different childhoods: one is from Vietnam and the other is from America. The Alternate told Hardcase and Choice that the answers Choice seeks lays in the headquarters of Aladdin, so they decide to visit the headquarters again. Meanwhile, an agent of Aladdin recruits both Hardwire and Head Knocker to join on a mission to defeat Hardcase and to make certain he does not reach the Aladdin base. The two criminals are joined with Dirt Devil, Foxfire and War Eagle. The Aladdin crew meet up with Choice and Hardcase in the middle of a deserted road, a battle sure to come.

ComicInfo.Title: Angry Past, Part 1: Agent Snowdon
